author: schor
msg: [UIMA-2498] change strategy for where to hold "previous" values used in computing differences, for ints and feature structure refs.  This was motivated by the use case of type filtering type T2, and having a reference chain go thru the filtered type. A side benefit, now allow skipping of update of previous value when the value written is 0 - might (slightly) improve compression in some cases.
Also fix compare and enqueue for case where ref chain goes through filtered-out type.

author: sebb
msg: Allow concatenated encoded strings provided that the padding is in the correct place.
Detect and report truncated input and badly placed padding

author: xuhaihong
msg: GERONIMO-6422 Enable usehttponly feature of tomcat in geronimo 2.1.x (Based on the patch from XieZhi)

author: rkanter
msg: OOZIE-1278 oozie example datelist-java-main has job property typo and has no lib directory for examples.jar (bowenzhangusa via rkanter)
